title: Eastern Province Water Supply Development Project - Tender for Construction of Treatment Plant and Towers at Mahaoya, Augmentation of Treatment Plant/Intake at Dehiattakandiya and Construction sumps/Pump Houses and other civil works at Saddatissa, Konduwatuwana, Uhana, Damana, Hingurana and Pothuwil areas
decision_details: ? the proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to award the above tender for a sum of Rs.568,967,742.83, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
